argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_fofn | |- ( F : A -onto-> B -> F Fn A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fofn | |- ( G : C -onto-> D -> G Fn C ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( F : A -onto-> B /\ G : C -onto-> D ) -> ( F Fn A /\ G Fn C ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fnun | |- ( ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn C ) /\ ( A i^i C ) = (/) ) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. C ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ( F : A -onto-> B /\ G : C -onto-> D ) /\ ( A i^i C ) = (/) ) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. C ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_rnun | |- ran ( F u. G ) = ( ran F u. ran G ) |
| 7 |  | #P_forn | |- ( F : A -onto-> B -> ran F = B ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ad2antrr | |- ( ( ( F : A -onto-> B /\ G : C -onto-> D ) /\ ( A i^i C ) = (/) ) -> ran F = B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_forn | |- ( G : C -onto-> D -> ran G = D ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( F : A -onto-> B /\ G : C -onto-> D ) /\ ( A i^i C ) = (/) ) -> ran G = D ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_uneq12d | |- ( ( ( F : A -onto-> B /\ G : C -onto-> D ) /\ ( A i^i C ) = (/) ) -> ( ran F u. ran G ) = ( B u. D ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( ( F : A -onto-> B /\ G : C -onto-> D ) /\ ( A i^i C ) = (/) ) -> ran ( F u. G ) = ( B u. D ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_df-fo | |- ( ( F u. G ) : ( A u. C ) -onto-> ( B u. D ) <-> ( ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. C ) /\ ran ( F u. G ) = ( B u. D ) ) ) |
| 14 | 5, 12, 13 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( ( F : A -onto-> B /\ G : C -onto-> D ) /\ ( A i^i C ) = (/) ) -> ( F u. G ) : ( A u. C ) -onto-> ( B u. D ) ) |
